page.title: 11Unemployment in Somerton
page.content: { Leffman's is an established factory in Somerton which has employed local people for more than twenty years. It manufactures foundation garments for leading stores like Marks and Spencer and Debenhams.Because there is not enough work for all the factories he owns Mr Leffman is closing his factory in Somerton and concentrating the work at Bristol and Bridgwater.My Mum has been given ninety days notice and everyone who works there has to be out by September 6th 1985.My Mum hopes that it will be taken over by someone else. If not she says I will have less pocket money each week.It would make a lovely Sports Centre with a swimming pool out in the back field.
